Bow Threading talents will freely swap to your bow when activated if you have one in your secondary slot. You may use the Shoot talent in a similar manner.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

Splitting the timeline is difficult, you will only be protected after the current turn ends.

These bonuses scale with your Magic stat.

value.info_text:
Choose an activatable spell that affects only you and does not require a target. When you take damage that reduces your life below 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% the spell will automatically cast.

This spell will cast even if it is currently on cooldown, will not consume a turn or resources, and uses the talent level of Contingency or its own, whichever is lower.

This effect can only occur once every 50 turns and takes place after the damage is resolved.

Current Contingency Spell: None
value.name: Contingency
See the Threads
value.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 5, 9, 13, 16, 19 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight values) while See the Threads is active.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

If you die in any thread you'll revert the timeline to the point when you first cast the spell and the effect will end.

This spell may only be used once per zone level.

Attack the target with either your ranged or melee weapons for 120% weapon damage. For the next ten turns random targeting, such as from Blink Blade and Warden's Call, will focus on this target.

Attacks against this target gain 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% critical chance and critical strike power while you take 13%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% less damage from all enemies whose rank is lower then that of your focus target.
value.name: Warden's Focus

value.info_text:
Upon activation summon a Temporal Hound. Every 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns another hound will be summoned, up to a maximum of three hounds. If a hound dies you'll summon a new hound in 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns.

Your hounds inherit your increased damage percent, have 9%, 16%, 21%, 25%, 28% physical resistance and 38%, 67%, 87%, 100%, 100% temporal resistance, and are immune to hostile teleportation effects.

Hounds will get, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Strength, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Dexterity, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Constitution, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Magic, 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Willpower, and 68, 85, 98, 109, 118 Cunning, based on your Magic stat.
value.name: Temporal Hounds
Command Hounds: Blink
value.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to teleport to the targeted location. If you target an enemy your hounds will set that enemy as their target.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 defense and 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% resist all after any teleport.

At talent level five, if you're not at your maximum number of hounds when you cast this spell a new one will be summoned.

The teleportation bonuses scale with your Spellpower.

Your hounds can now survive for up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns after their hit points are reduced below 1. While in this state they deal 50% less damage but are immune to additional damage.

Command Blink will now regenerate your hounds for 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 life per turn and increase their global speed by 24%, 37%, 45%, 50%, 54% for five turns. Hounds below 1 life when this effect occurs will have the bonuses doubled.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% stun, blind, confusion, and pin resistance.

The regeneration scales with your Spellpower.
value.name: Temporal Vigour

value.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to breathe time, dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 temporal damage and reducing the three highest stats of all targets in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone.

Affected targets will have their stats reduced by 12, 15, 17, 19, 21 for 3 turns. You are immune to the breath of your own hounds and your hounds are immune to stat damage from other hounds.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% temporal damage affinity.
value.name: Command Hounds: Breathe

value.info_text:
Attack with your bow or dual-weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If you shoot an arrow you'll teleport near the target location. If you use your dual-weapons you'll teleport up to your bow's range away.

Additionally you now go Out of Phase for five turns after any teleport, gaining 11, 14, 17, 19, 21 defense and 6%, 9%, 10%, 12%, 13% resist all.

The Out of Phase bonuses will scale with your Magic stat.
value.name: Thread Walk

value.info_text:
Each time you hit with an arrow you reduce the cooldown of one Blade Threading talent on cooldown by one turn.

Each time you hit with a melee weapon you reduce the cooldown of one Bow Threading talent on cooldown by one turn.

This effect can only occur 2, 3, 4, 6, 7 times per turn.
value.name: Blended Threads

value.info_text: Attack with your bow or dual-weapons for 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% damage. If you use your bow you'll shoot all targets in a beam. If you use your dual-weapons you'll attack all targets within a radius of one around you.
value.name: Thread the Needle

value.info_text:
When you hit with a melee or arrow attack a warden may appear from another timeline, depending on available space, and shoot or attack a random enemy.

The wardens are out of phase with this reality and deal 78%, 55%, 44%, 39%, 35% less damage but the bow warden's arrows will pass through friendly targets.

This effect can only occur once per turn and the wardens return to their own timeline after attacking.
value.name: Warden's Call

value.info_text:
Pulls a medium, medium, big, big, huge size or smaller copy of the target from another timeline; the copy stays for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. The copy and the target will be compelled to attack each other immediately.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.
value.name: Temporal Clone
See the Threads
value.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present. Note that seeing visions of your own death can still be fatal.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

This spell takes no time to cast.

value2.info_text:
Creates a wake of temporal energy that deals 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 damage in a beam, as you attempt to rethread the timeline. Affected targets may be stunned, blinded, pinned, or confused for 3 turns.

Each target you hit with Rethread will reduce your Paradox by 1.6, 2.9, 4.1, 5.2, 6.2.

The damage will increase with your Paradox and Spellpower.
value2.name: Rethread

value.info_text:
Rethread the timeline, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 temporal damage to the target before moving on to a second target.

Rethread can hit up to 3 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Rethread

value.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns two alternate versions of you enter your timeline. While the effect is active all damage done by you or your copies is reduced by two thirds and all damage received is split between the three of you.

Temporal Fugue does not normally cooldown while active. You may take direct control of your clones, give them orders, and set their talent usage.

Damage you deal to Fugue Clones or that they deal to you or each other is reduced to zero.
value.name: Temporal Fugue

value.info_text:
Your Rethread now braids the lifelines of all targets it hits for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. Braided targets take 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The amount of damage shared will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Braid Lifelines

value.info_text:
Over the next 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline, lowering its resistance to physical and temporal damage by 23%, 34%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

If you manage to kill the target while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The resistance penalty will scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Cease to Exist

value.info_text:
By slightly reorganizing history, you reduce your Paradox by 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 and temporarily stabilize the timeline; this allows chronomancy to be used without chance of failure for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns (backfires and anomalies may still occur).

The paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Static History

value.info_text:
Pull a bolt of temporal energy back through time. The bolt will home in on your location, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage to targets, and reducing the cooldown of one chronomancy talent on cooldown by one turn per enemy hit.

The bolt gains 5% damage each time it moves and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.

At talent level five cooldowns are reduced by two.
value.name: Temporal Bolt

value2.info_text:
Inflicts 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 temporal damage, if the target fails a spell save. If your target survives, it will be removed from time for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The duration will scale with your Paradox. The damage will scale with your Paradox and Spellpower.
value2.name: Time Skip

value.info_text:
Inflicts 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 temporal damage. If your target survives, it may be removed from time for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

Manipulate the flow of time, reducing the cooldown of all your talents on cooldown by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns, and reducing the duration of most status effects currently affecting you (good or bad) by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The effect will scale with your Paradox.

value.name: Temporal Reprieve
value.info_text: Transport yourself to a safe place for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

Creates a temporal echo in a nova around you, in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7. Affected targets will take 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 temporal damage, as well as 15%, 17%, 18%, 19%, 20% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The percentage and damage scales with your Paradox and Spellpower.
value2.name: Echoes From The Past

The additional damage will be divided by the target's rank and the damage scales with your Spellpower.

Fires a bolt of pure filth, diseasing your target with a disease doing 49, 64, 75, 85, 94 blight damage per turns for 6 turns, and reducing one of its physical stats (strength, constitution, dexterity) by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45. The three diseases can stack.

Virulent Disease will always try to apply a disease the target does not currently have, and also one that will have the most debilitating effect for the target.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:
You breathe insidious poison in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 36, 47, 54, 61, 67 nature damage each turn for 6 turns.

The poison also reduces the healing of enemies poisoned by 21%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% while it is in effect.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in Venomous Breath also increases your nature resistance by 2%.
value2.name: Venomous Breath

value.info_text:
You breathe crippling poison in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 41, 53, 62, 69, 76 nature damage each turn for 6 turns.

The poison also gives enemies a 11%, 15%, 18%, 21%, 23% chance to fail actions more complicated than basic attacks and movement, while it is in effect.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in Venomous Breath also increases your nature resistance by 3%, and your nature damage by 4%.
value.name: Venomous Breath

value2.info_text:
You have the mental prowess of a Wyrm.

Your Cunning is increased by 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

You gain 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% knockback resistance, and your blindness and stun resistances are increased by 8%, 15%, 20%, 25%, 30%.
value2.name: Wyrmic Guile

value.info_text:
You have the mental prowess of a Wyrm.

Your Cunning is increased by 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and your breath attack cooldowns are reduced by 2, 4, 5, 6, 6.

You gain 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% knockback resistance, and your blindness and stun resistances are increased by 8%, 15%, 20%, 25%, 30%.
value.name: Wyrmic Guile

value2.info_text:
Attack the target for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% nature weapon damage.

If the attack brings your target below 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% life or kills it, you can try to swallow it, killing it automatically and regaining life and equilibrium depending on its level.

The chance to swallow depends on your talent level and the relative size of the target.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value2.name: Swallow

value.info_text:
Attack the target for 205%, 224%, 239%, 251%, 262% Nature weapon damage.

If the attack brings your target below 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% life or kills it, you can try to swallow it, killing it automatically and regaining life and equilibrium depending on its level.

The chance to swallow depends on your talent level and the relative size of the target.

Levels in Swallow additionally raises your Physical and Mental critical rate by 2%, 5%, 8%, 10%, 12%, passively.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value.name: Swallow

value2.info_text:
You slam your foot onto the ground, shaking the area around you in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

Creatures caught by the quake will be damaged for 3, 8, 17, 27, 36 and knocked back up to 4 tiles away.

The terrain will also be moved around within the quake's radius.

The damage will increase with your Strength.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value2.name: Quake

value.info_text:
You slam the ground, shaking the area around you in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

Creatures caught by the quake will be damaged for 170%, 187%, 200%, 211%, 221% weapon damage, and knocked back up to 3 tiles away.

The terrain will also be moved around within the radius, and the user will be shifted to a random square within the radius.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value.name: Quake

value2.info_text:
Allows you to burrow into walls for 9, 13, 17, 20, 23 turns.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value2.name: Burrow

value.info_text:
Allows you to burrow into earthen walls for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Your powerful digging abilities also allow you to exploit and smash through enemy defensive weaknesses; You ignore 28, 35, 40, 45, 48 of target armor and 14%, 17%, 20%, 22%, 24% of enemy physical damage resistance while this is in effect.

At Talent Level 5, this talent can be used instantly, and the cooldown will reduce with levels.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value.name: Burrow

value2.info_text:
You breathe sand in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 139, 181, 212, 238, 260 physical damage, and be blinded for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
value2.name: Sand Breath

value.name: Sand Breath
value.info_text:
You breathe sand in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 164, 213, 250, 280, 306 physical damage, and will be blinded for 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.

value2.info_text:
You transform into pure lightning, moving 495%, 595%, 682%, 761%, 836% faster for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 game turns.

Also provides 30% physical damage resistance and 100% lightning resistance.

Any actions other than moving will stop this effect.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value2.name: Lightning Speed

value.name: Lightning Speed
value.info_text:
You transform into pure lightning, moving 495%, 595%, 682%, 761%, 836% faster for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 game turns.

Also provides 30% physical damage resistance and 100% lightning resistance.

Any actions other than moving will stop this effect.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.

Levels in Lightning Speed additionally raises your Movement Speed by 11%, 22%, 32%, 41%, 49%, passively.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value2.name: Static Field
value2.info_text:
Generate an electrical field around you in a radius of 1. Any creature caught inside will lose up to 29%, 36%, 40%, 43%, 45% of its current life (effect decreased for higher creature ranks).

This effect cannot kill creatures. Life loss will increase with your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.

value.info_text:
Generate an electrical field around you in a radius of 1, 3, 4, 6, 7. Any creature caught inside will lose up to 29%, 36%, 40%, 43%, 45% of its current life (20%, 24%, 27%, 29%, 30% if the target is Elite or Rare, 15%, 18%, 20%, 21%, 23% if the target is a Unique or Boss, and 12%, 14%, 16%, 17%, 18% if they are an Elite Boss.). This life drain is irresistable, but can be saved against with physical save.

Additionally, it will deal 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 lightning damage afterwards, regardless of target rank.

Current life loss and lightning damage will increase with your Mindpower, and the lightning damage element can critically hit with mental critical chances.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value.name: Static Field

value2.info_text:
Summons a tornado that moves slowly toward its target, following it if it changes position.

Any foe caught in its path takes 73, 98, 118, 135, 150 lightning damage.

When it reaches its target, it explodes in a radius of 1 for 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 lightning damage and 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 physical damage. All affected creatures will be knocked back, and the targeted creature will be stunned for 4 turns.

The tornado will last for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, or until it reaches its target.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value2.name: Tornado

value.info_text:
Summons a tornado that moves slowly toward its target, following it if it changes position.

Any foe caught in its path takes 73, 98, 118, 135, 150 lightning damage.

When it reaches its target, it explodes in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 for 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 lightning damage and 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 physical damage. All affected creatures will be knocked back, and the targeted creature will be stunned for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. The blast will ignore the talent user.

The tornado will last for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns, or until it reaches its target.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower, and the stun chance is based on your Mindpower vs target Physical Save.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value.name: Tornado

value2.info_text:
You breathe lightning in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 57, 74, 86, 97, 106 to 170, 221, 259, 290, 318 lightning damage, and can be dazed for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value2.name: Lightning Breath

value.info_text:
You breathe lightning in a frontal cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 74, 96, 112, 126, 137 to 221, 287, 336, 377, 412 lightning damage, and have a 38%, 45%, 50%, 55%, 58% chance to be dazed for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate. The Daze chance is based on your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
value.name: Lightning Breath

value2.info_text:
Spray forth a glob of acidic moisture at your enemy.

The target will take 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 Mindpower-based acid damage.

Enemies struck have a 25% chance to be Disarmed for three turns, as their weapon is rendered useless by an acid coating.

At Talent Level 5, this becomes a piercing line of acid.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
value2.name: Acidic Spray

value.info_text:

Enemies struck have a 25% chance to be Disarmed for three turns, as their weapon is rendered useless by an acid coating.

value.name: Acidic Spray

value2.info_text:
Exhale a mist of lingering acid, dealing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 acid damage that can critical in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn for 6, 6, 7, 7, 7 turns.

Enemies in this mist will be corroded for 2, 3, 3, 3, 4 turns, lowering their Accuracy, their Armour and their Defense by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25.

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower, and the radius will increase with talent level.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
value2.name: Corrosive Mist

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower, and the radius will increase with talent level.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
value.name: Corrosive Mist
